frameDefinitions: A Cause leads to the formation of a Created_entity.
A Sound emitted by a  Sound_source, which construed as a single point, moves along a Path.
The Creator creates a new entity, the Created_entity, possibly out of Components.
An Agent acts to begin the life of a Process.
A Subpart of a Time_period is picked out.
An Agent initiates the beginning of an ongoing Activity in which he will be continuously involved. '' 'At the same time, city-states began to grow in influence on the southern Greek mainland.'
frameExamples: Her shouts <t>echoed</t> around the cylinder formed by the walls.
The Libyans were <t>generating</t> arms for export.
After discovering her knack for organization, she decided to try to  <t>launch</t> a career in human resources.
I nearly kicked my TV this afternoon after watching the shambolic <t><fex name='subpar'>end</fex></t> of the Austrian Grand-Prix .
At the same time, city-states <t>began</t> to grow in influence on the southern Greek mainland.
listRoleDefinitions: This role identifies the entity that the Agent intentionally creates.
An animate or inanimate entity, a force, or event that produces an effect. Volitionality is not a necessary characteristic of <fen>Cause</fen>s.
The <fen>Creator</fen> creates a created entity.
This role identifes the Time when an Agent intentionally creates a new entity.
This role identifies the place ehere the Agent intentionally creates the new entity.
A percept produced  in hearing organs by  vibrations which travel through the air or another medium.
The location of the Sound_source from which the <fen>Sound</fen> travels
The Path of the Sound's movement is any description of its trajectory of motion which is neither a Location_of_sound_source or a Goal.
The point-like entity which produces the <fen>Sound</fen>.
A description of the location where the <fen>Sound</fen> ends up.
The time when  the <fen>Sound</fen> movement occurs.
A setting in which <fen>Sound</fen> movement happens.
The Creator creates a created entity.
This role identifies the entity that the Agent intentionally creates.
This role identifes the Time when an Agent intentionally creates a new entity.
This role identifies the place ehere the Agent intentionally creates the new entity.
This Frame Element marks expressions that indicate the process that the <fen>Agent</fen> initiates.
The <fen>Agent</fen> is the actor responsible for starting the <fen>Process</fen>.
This role is for the <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Agent</fen> initiates the <fen>Process</fen>.
This role identifies the <fen>Place</fen> where the <fen>Process</fen> is initiated.
The part of the <fen>Time_period</fen> which is profiled.
A temporal span conceived of as a whole.
This role indicates the <fen>Time</fen> that is being referred to.
This role identifies the <fen>Activity</fen> that an <fen>Agent</fen> starts.
This role identifies the being that starts the intentional <fen>Activity</fen>.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Agent</fen> starts an <fen>Activity</fen>.
This role identifies the <fen>Place</fen> where the <fen>Agent</fen> starts an <fen>Activity</fen>.
listRoleExamples: The Prince 's laugh echoed <fex>from the corridor</fex>.
A loud bang echoed <fex>through the valley</fex>.
There was muzak echoing <fex>from cheap speakers</fex>.
<fex>In the mornings</fex> the harsh , squawking voices of the gulls echo between the channel walls
I heard their footsteps echo <fex>in the hollow cavern</fex>.
The findings mark the <fex>beginning</fex> of a new age of planetary science, in which 'extrasolar' planets can be directly measured and compared.
A zillion copies and clones have been made of this Russian game since it first was released in the mid <fex>80's</fex>.
